mapper.insert: insert into order (order_id, buyer_id, saler_id, `time`, order_state, goods_id, buyer_score, saler_score) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{buyerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{salerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{time,jdbcType=DATE}, #{orderState,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{buyerScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{salerScore,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update order set buyer_id = #{buyerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, saler_id = #{salerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `time` = #{time,jdbcType=DATE}, order_state = #{orderState,jdbcType=TINYINT}, goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, buyer_score = #{buyerScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, saler_score = #{salerScore,jdbcType=INTEGER} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select order_id, buyer_id, saler_id, `time`, order_state, goods_id, buyer_score, saler_score from order where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select order_id, buyer_id, saler_id, `time`, order_state, goods_id, buyer_score, saler_score from `order`
